name: Bogged Down
description:
Darkness has invaded your swamp, stop it before it submerges all light.

Controls: 

WASD/Left Analog Stick - Move
LMB/Controller "X" - Attack

*Partial controller support

Made for the Weekly Game Jam 213, a more polished version is on its way.

Design/Programming/: Marcos Lopes (ModularSkeleton)
3D Art/Foliage: Vexiishoal

BGM:

Wind Of The Rainforest Preview by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5729-wind-of-the-rainforest-preview
